vote.text: Amendment SA 2862 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2862 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR 9/21/2012 S6661) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2862 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Shaheen.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2862 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
